snippet: An evangelist preacher is calling for a boycott of the upcoming Walt Disney film "Beauty and the Beast" because it features a gay character, saying that the company is trying to promote an LGBT agenda to children....

headline.main: 'Beauty and Beast' Gay Character Sparks Christian Boycott Calls
headline.print_headline: 'Beauty and Beast' Gay Character Sparks Christian Boycott Calls

lead_paragraph: An evangelist preacher is calling for a boycott of the upcoming Walt Disney film "Beauty and the Beast" because it features a gay character, saying that the company is trying to promote an LGBT agenda to children.
